title: St. Albert the Great - Day 1
content:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Heavenly Father, you made St Albert truly Great by enabling him to combine human wisdom and Divine Faith. We ask you to allow St Albert the Great to come to our assistance as we study and prepare for our Finals and Exams and all our studies. We ask the Blessed Mother Mary to intercede on our behalf, in not only bringing us closer to her Son, Jesus, but also to take us to Jesus along with St. Albert the Great, the patron Saint of Students.

May our knowledge, which we work so hard to acquire, serve always for the honor and glory of God, for our salvation and that of the whole world. Through Jesus Christ our Lord. Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father
Hail Mary
Glory Be

Saint Albert the Great, pray for us!
